text: Melvin Wayne Osmond (August 28, 1951 â€“ January 1, 2025) was an American musician. He was a member of The Osmonds singing family. Osmond was a cancer activist. He started being one after suffering from a brain tumour in the year 1997. Osmond died on January 1, 2025 in Salt Lake City, Utah from a stroke at the age of 73. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:Singers from Utah Category:1951 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Musicians from Utah Category:Deaths from stroke
